skills.name: Toad Poison
skills.description: Covers the enemy with poison, removes 1 beneficial effect, and prevents the target from receiving beneficial effects for 1 turn with a 75% chance.

skills.name: Thorny Bush Summoning
skills.description: Attacks all enemies 4 times by summoning thorny bushes and makes them fall asleep for 1 turn with a 50% chance.

skill_effect.name: Sleep
skill_effect.description: The monster is put to sleep and cannot attack unless awakened, either after a fixed amount of turns or after taking damage
